page.title: 20Police Man
page.content: We interviewed P.C.King.He has been working in the Police force for 18 years.They have to be 5 foot 9 in height.They have to be between18_52 years bofore they can join the police force.They take in people who break the law.He works 8 hours a day.He has never been hurt.They have 2 days a week off.They work early turn 12_8,normal turn 8_4 and late turn 4_12.The cars they use are Metros,Maestros,Ford Grandas,Astras,Fiestas and Rovers.The worest crimeis murder.Accidents happen every day.The chief constables name is Mr.Crump.They do not catch many people who drink and drive.They carry truncheons,walike talkies,handcuffs.They do not carry guns.The most common crime is theft.
